title: Demon Pin
description:
Dancing with the demon.


1" Enamel Pin with metal backing.

title: RAW VISION HOODIE (YELLOW)
description:
New reprint of the original "Raw Vision" hoodie! Now featuring the grim reaper not inverted.

Cotton/poly blend hooded sweatshirt.

Printed on front chest, pocket, right sleeve, left side of hood, & back

title: ALONE TEE WHITE
description:
Experience the terror... of being ALONE! rated R.



Silkscreen print on 100% Combed Ring Spun Cotton.

title: ALIEN BODY CLASSIC CREWNECK
description: A return of the classic "Hollywood Babylon" design from the very early days of Alien Body! Not having been available for years, the long sleeve design had become a collector's item and is now available for the first time on a 100% cotton crew neck sweatshirt.

title: "Reptilian Agenda" Longsleeve
description: Behold! The scaled hand of a shapeshifting reptilian overlord.

title: TECHNO SHAMAN SOCKS
description: Let your feet retrace the steps of the shamans who walked before you on this earth! Become a TECHNO SHAMAN!

title: RAW VISION TEAL
description:
New highly limited color way of the classic “Raw Vision” hoodies from Alien Body.

The will isn’t weak! YOU have the raw vision!

title: Hooded Crop Circle T-Shirt
description:
Cotton hooded T-shirt Featuring actual crop circle formations and the date and location where they appeared in England. The mystery deepens...

- Custom cut and sew hooded t-shirt with white drawstrings.

title: Alien Body Pharmaceuticals
description:
"Basel, Switzerland 1943"
Limited Edition of 60!

title: Cop Terror Tee
description: STOP cop terror! STOP police brutality. You are your own authority! A return of the classic design from 2015, never before printed on short sleeve.

title: HYPER REAL FACE MELT T-SHIRT
description:
Inspired by the body horror classic, Street Trash.... the image is a photo taken behind the scenes on set of the music video shoot for "Hyper Real" by Pictureplane. Melt your fucking face off!



Digital print on a high-quality Next Level T-Shirt.

title: DEATH METAL LOGO POLO
description: Simple. Clean. Sophisticated street sensibility. The Alien Body "death metal" logo embroidered on an iconic button up black cotton polo shirt.

title: ALIEN BODY MANGA INDEX JOGGERS - WHITE
description:
New for Spring 1994, extremely comfortable cotton joggers with front and back pockets, detailing hot new manga titles for your reading pleasure!



Product Details:
80% Cotton/20% Poly Ring Spun Yarn. 9 oz Heavy Weight Fleece. Elastic Waistband. Cuff Ribbed Ankles. Two Front Pockets. One Back Pocket. Tapered Fit.

title: JUDGMENT DAY SOCKS
description: Reptilian judgment ! in the near distant future of 1992! New York City!

description:
New for Spring 1994, extremely comfortable cotton joggers with front and back pockets, detailing hot new manga titles for your reading pleasure!

80% Cotton/20% Poly Ring Spun Yarn. 9 oz Heavy Weight Fleece. Elastic Waistband. Cuff Ribbed Ankles. Two Front Pockets. One Back Pocket. Tapered Fit.

title: THE WILL ISN'T WEAK TIE DYE LONG SLEEVE
description: Your will is strong! You control your own destiny! Meet your maker in this psychedelic long sleeve.

Black widow... Got your venom running through my veins.... isn’t it romantic?

title: "SHOW ME LOVE" TOTE BAG
description: An homage to one of the greatest works of art of our age, carry your belongings and show love.

description:

title: MALK - UNREQUITED
description:
Every 2000 years, the unholy Alien Body returns. Behold the antichrist!



Digital print on a high-quality Next Level T-Shirt.

title: CHAOS RADICAL BUCKET HAT
description: For the non-linear mind in a realm of infinite possibility. Follow your own star! Create your own reality!

title: ARIAL BLACK LOGO BEANIE
description: Embroidered knit beanies perfect for the mountains, glaciers or the streets.

title: ALIEN BODY HOOLIGAN SCARF
description:
Are you a fan of ALIEN BODY? show your appreciation with this high quality knitted soccer scarf, and cause some real damage in the streets with your hooligan friends.


HD Jacquard Knit Scarf Material: 100% High quality acrylic (High-Definition).
Design: Double-Sided, different design on each side.
